rule.conditionDesc: ( sharedflag in CurrentRecord = "3" OR sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 4)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">3</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">4</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Share Record to Incident Category (when ( sharedflag in CurrentRecord = "3" OR sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 4))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var tablename = \"imCategory\";\u000avar name = record.name;\u000avar workflow = \"Incident\";\u000avar active = record.active;\u000avar sharedflag = record.sharedflag;\u000avar company= record.company;\u000avar description = record.description;\u000a\u000alib.HelpDeskCategoryUtil.addCategoryRecord(tablename, name, workflow,active, sharedflag,company,description);"}

rule.conditionDesc: ( Apply To in CurrentRecord = 4 OR Apply To in CurrentRecord = "5")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">4</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">5</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Share Record to Problem Category (when ( Apply To in CurrentRecord = 4 OR Apply To in CurrentRecord = "5"))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var tablename = \"pbmCategory\";\u000avar name = record.name;\u000avar workflow = \"Problem\";\u000avar active = record.active;\u000avar sharedflag = record.sharedflag;\u000avar company = record.company;\u000avar description = record.description;\u000a\u000alib.HelpDeskCategoryUtil.addCategoryRecord(tablename, name, workflow,active, sharedflag, company, description);\u000a"}
